scripts.clean: rm -rf allure-results allure-report cypress/videos cypress/screenshots allure-results-*
scripts.combine: mkdir -p allure-results && cp allure-results-chrome/* allure-results/ && cp allure-results-electron/* allure-results/
scripts.test:all: npm run clean && npm run test:chrome && npm run save:chrome && npm run test:electron && npm run save:electron && npm run combine && npm run report
